title: Dragon hunter crossbow (t)

properties.name: description
properties.value: The dragon hunter crossbow (t) is a turquoise variant of the dragon hunter crossbow. It can be created by using Vorkath's head on the crossbow after completing the elite Combat Achievements. This is reversible, and the head will be returned to the inventory along with the crossbow. This variant is purely cosmetic and gives no advantages over the regular Dragon hunter crossbow.

The dragon hunter crossbow (t) is a turquoise variant of the dragon hunter crossbow. It can be created by using Vorkath's head on the crossbow after completing the elite Combat Achievements. This is reversible, and the head will be returned to the inventory along with the crossbow. This variant is purely cosmetic and gives no advantages over the regular Dragon hunter crossbow.

[[File:Dragon hunter crossbow (t) detail.png|left|150px]]
The '''dragon hunter crossbow (t)''' is a turquoise variant of the [[dragon hunter crossbow]]. It can be created by using [[Vorkath's head]] on the crossbow after completing the [[elite Combat Achievements]]. This is reversible, and the head will be returned to the inventory along with the crossbow. This variant is purely cosmetic and gives no advantages over the regular Dragon hunter crossbow.
